color.description: Text color for the card. Defaults to the dark text color.
Background color for the card. Defaults to the base background color.

gap.description: Gap between the header, content and footer.

block.description: Padding space above and below the card's body. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right the card's body. Equal values in the inline axis.

color.description: Border color for the card. Inherits the card's text color.
